messages.subject: Jury Duty
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m going to the doc on Friday hoping for a medical excuse.  Otherwise I have to be available to serve on civil trials in Feb.  I can t imagine having to
messages.messageBody:
>
> Can people with ADD get excused from jury duty? <g>
>
> I could never concentrate on *anything* for that long. I would be
> doodling, staring out the window, twirling my hair.
>
> I pity the poor defendant.

I'm going to the doc on Friday hoping for a medical excuse. Otherwise I
have to be available to serve on civil trials in Feb. I can't imagine
having to sit still for that long. I have to be able to get up and walk
around whenever I need to, or I start looking for the Tin Woodman's oil can.
Then there's the brain fog. Once I get tired, clear thinking is nearly
impossible. And memory ceases to exist.
Tia
